response.overview: West Point, New York, 1830. When a cadet at the burgeoning military academy is found hanged with his heart cut out, the top brass summons former New York City constable Augustus Landor to investigate. While attempting to solve this grisly mystery, the reluctant detective engages the help of one of the cadets: a strange but brilliant young fellow by the name of Edgar Allan Poe.
response.title: The Pale Blue Eye

results.name: SCENE AT THE ACADEMY: The Pale Blue Eye
A crime so grisly, you need Edgar Allan Poe
Murder at West Point: Creating The Pale Blue Eye
